2410.08656.title: radarODE-MTL: A Multi-Task Learning Framework with Eccentric Gradient Alignment for Robust Radar-Based ECG Reconstruction
2410.08656.paper_summary:
Millimeter-wave radar is promising to provide robust and accurate vital sign
monitoring in an unobtrusive manner. However, the radar signal might be
distorted in propagation by ambient noise or random body movement, ruining the
subtle cardiac activities and destroying the vital sign recovery. In
particular, the recovery of electrocardiogram (ECG) signal heavily relies on
the deep-learning model and is sensitive to noise. Therefore, this work
creatively deconstructs the radar-based ECG recovery into three individual
tasks and proposes a multi-task learning (MTL) framework, radarODE-MTL, to
increase the robustness against consistent and abrupt noises. In addition, to
alleviate the potential conflicts in optimizing individual tasks, a novel
multi-task optimization strategy, eccentric gradient alignment (EGA), is
proposed to dynamically trim the task-specific gradients based on task
difficulties in orthogonal space. The proposed radarODE-MTL with EGA is
evaluated on the public dataset with prominent improvements in accuracy, and
the performance remains consistent under noises. The experimental results
indicate that radarODE-MTL could reconstruct accurate ECG signals robustly from
radar signals and imply the application prospect in real-life situations. The
code is available at: http://github.com/ZYY0844/radarODE-MTL.
2410.08656.paper_summary_zh: 毫米波雷達有望以非侵入式的方式提供強健且準確的生命徵象監測。然而，雷達信號在傳播過程中可能會因環境噪音或隨機的身體移動而失真，破壞微妙的心臟活動並破壞生命徵象的恢復。特別是，心電圖 (ECG) 信號的恢復嚴重依賴於深度學習模型，並且對噪音很敏感。因此，這項工作創意性地將基於雷達的 ECG 恢復解構為三個單獨的任務，並提出了一個多任務學習 (MTL) 框架 radarODE-MTL，以提高對一致和突然噪音的魯棒性。此外，為了緩解在優化個別任務時潛在的衝突，提出了一種新穎的多任務優化策略，離心梯度對齊 (EGA)，以根據正交空間中的任務難度動態修剪特定任務的梯度。所提出的具有 EGA 的 radarODE-MTL 在公共數據集上進行了評估，準確度顯著提高，並且在噪音下性能保持一致。實驗結果表明，radarODE-MTL 可以從雷達信號中穩健地重建準確的 ECG 信號，並暗示了在現實生活中應用的前景。代碼可在以下位置獲得：http://github.com/ZYY0844/radarODE-MTL。
